name: AND IT'S GONE
description: $GONE - Making Your Crypto Money Safe. The Popular Meme Now On Solana. The "And It's Gone" meme comes from South Park (Season 13, Episode 3: "Margaritaville"), which aired in 2009. In the scene, Stan deposits money at a bank, but the banker immediately puts it into a risky investment and flatly states: "Aaaand... it's gone!" The meme is widely used to depict situations where money or other assets suddenly disappear, often due to bad investments, scams, or misfortune. It is especially popular in finance and crypto communities. This meme is well-documented on KnowYourMeme.com, where its origins, variations, and cultural impact are explored. Why $GONE? The crypto markets can be bad, but $GONE is good. While other coins are losing their value, and most are rugging, you can still make profit with $GONE. It is different. It's here to help you!
